title: Polynucleotide Face Therapy
description: Highly purified polynucleotide injections regenerate collagen, calm inflammation, and restore bounce across the face and neck.
longDescription: Polynucleotides (PN) are DNA fragments that supercharge your skin’s repair response. We micro-inject PN along cheeks, temples, and jawline to hydrate deeply, reduce redness, and tighten texture. Think of it as a skin reboot that pairs beautifully with fillers, lasers, or PRP—ideal for anyone craving lit-from-within radiance without downtime.

overview.title: What PN Does for the Face
overview.content: PN attracts water, signals fibroblasts, and moderates inflammation pathways. We place it across cheeks, temples, jawline, and neck to smooth fine lines, repair barrier damage, and enhance luminosity. It’s the ideal maintenance treatment between fillers or as a standalone glow plan.

faq.question: Is PN the same as filler?
faq.answer: No—PN hydrates and repairs but doesn’t create volume.

faq.question: How often do I need it?
faq.answer: Most clients repeat every 6-9 months or before big events.
